item.title: Kamala Harris:: CausalImpact
item.description: I want to look at the effect Kamala Harrisâ€™ performance in the first presidential debate on the volume of articles being written about her. There was an idea that Harris was under represented by the media coming up to debates. But the confrontation with Biden has earned her campaign more attention ## Analysis report {CausalImpact} ## ## ## During the post-intervention period, the response variable had an average value of approx.
